explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses a hybrid deep learning technique for financial risk prediction, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed model integrates CNN and Transformer, both of which are deep learning architectures.
explanations.neural network: The CNN and Transformer are types of neural networks used in the proposed model.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper explicitly mentions using CNN to derive local features from the data.
explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for Convolutional Neural Network, which is a key component of the proposed model.
explanations.attention mechanism: The Transformer model, which is part of the proposed framework, relies on attention mechanisms to capture long-term dependencies.
explanations.representation learning: The model learns representations of financial data through CNN and Transformer for better prediction.
explanations.feature learning: The CNN and Transformer are used to learn features from the financial data.
explanations.feature representation: The model aims to improve feature representation through multiscale analysis using Wavelet Transform and deep learning techniques.
